definition: Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
to live like the immortals (advertising real estate)
foxes, ghosts and immortals/supernatural beings, usually fictional
have a smoke after each meal and you will surpass the immortals (proverb)
pinyin: fan4 hou4 yi1 zhi1 yan1 , sai4 guo4 huo2 shen2 xian1
containing_words.word: 飯後一支煙，賽過活神仙

sentences.english: So the good spirit collected wood every night.
sentences.chinese: 於是這位善良的神仙每天晚上收集木柴。

sentences.english: According to legend, during the Han Dynasty, the King of Huainan, Liu An, is especially keen on books about immortals and ghosts.
sentences.chinese: 相傳漢朝的淮南王劉安特別喜愛看描寫神仙鬼怪的書。

sentences.english: If a genie appeared, what would your 3 wishes be?
sentences.chinese: 如果一個神仙出現，你會許哪三個願望呢？

sentences.english: Natural beauties collocation, only envy mandarin duck not envy immortal.
sentences.chinese: 天生才子佳人搭配，只羨鴛鴦不羨神仙。

sentences.english: I bet I'll have a gay time.
sentences.chinese: 我敢說我會快活得像活神仙。

sentences.english: The good spirit thought about this.
sentences.chinese: 善良的神仙想着這個問題。

sentences.english: In remote mountain, animal deity life.
sentences.chinese: 深山中，動物過着神仙的生活。

sentences.english: Zhou, Qin and Han Dynasties was the important period for the formation and development of the belief.
sentences.chinese: 周秦兩漢是神仙信仰形成與發展的重要時期。

sentences.english: Where are the islands on which the immortals lived?
sentences.chinese: 神仙居住的蓬萊島究竟在何方？

sentences.english: I am also going to Shenxian Lake.
sentences.chinese: 正好我也要去神仙灣呢。

sentences.english: Why did it take shape in China?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼會在中國形成神仙觀念？

sentences.english: The development of the immortal belief of Han Dynasty and the culture of keeping in good health were both opposite and complementary to each other.
sentences.chinese: 漢代神仙信仰的發展與養生文化的興衰相反相成。

sentences.english: Even the celestial world is heavily guarded.
sentences.chinese: 神仙世界也是戒備森嚴的。

sentences.english: Huizhou is also considered a city of deities .
sentences.chinese: 惠州同時又是一座“神仙”集中的城市。

sentences.english: Compared with what we had to go through, his life is paradise already.
sentences.chinese: 和我們經歷的相比，他的生活已經是神仙般的了。

definition: to descend to the world (of immortals)
to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
Lü Dongbin (796-), Tang Dynasty scholar, one of the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
another name for Xi Wangmu 西王母, Queen Mother of the West
